1.title: You Can't Tell the Players...
1.plot: Miigs catches up with and then punishes Jackie; While in recovery for gunshot wounds, Kevin vows to continue looking for his kidnapped wife; Eddie pays a steep price for disloyalty; Hollis may be forced to partner with Bustamante.

2.title: Farewell, Interrupted
2.plot: Another Miigs and Bustamante showdown interrupts Eddie's memorial service; Capt. Koenig reveals the real reason she joined Det. Hollis on stakeout; Mrs. Fitzgerald goes back in time while telling Jackie how she and Kevin first met.

3.title: Two Drink Maximum
3.plot: Koenig and Hollis meet with ADA Kim Grier; Bustamante suddenly wants to partner with Miigs; Fiona tells Jackie about the cheating and drinking in her marriage; Kevin's sister Nora comes to town.

4.title: Confessions and Lies
4.plot: Eddie's killer is revealed and it's a shocker; Hollis and Koenig really turn up the heat; Kevin visits Mallory; Jackie wants to know the final plan, but Miigs is distracted by another woman.

1.title: Come Home, Brendan
1.plot: Fiona Fitzgerald goes out to get the morning newspaper and doesn't return; Distraught husband Kevin summons son Brendan and his pal Eddie home to look for her; Brendan is shocked to learn who his dad's business partner is.

2.title: Miigs and the Nurse
2.plot: Mrs. Fitzgerald has been missing for two days. Eddie thinks his cop connection might be able to help find her. But Lt. Alex Miigs may actually be responsible for her disappearance.

3.title: Knock, Knock
3.plot: In bad shape, Eddie returns with the pillbox; Brendan shows up at the LAPD station to report his mother's disappearance, surprising Miigs; Kidnap victim Fiona thinks husband Kevin is visiting, but is it her mind playing tricks?

4.title: Whack-A-Mole
4.plot: Following his interview by Lt. Miigs, Brendan Fitzgerald is corralled by Officer Campos and pumped for information. What she finds out and then reveals to Det. Hollis is a mind blower; Miigs has a fateful meeting with Sgt. Bustamante - one bad cop to another. It doesn't end well; Unaware that Kevin Fitzgerald is lurking somewhere in the house and thinking Eddie has fled, Jackie feels scared and alone. After Miigs delivers yet another abusive rant, she's had it - time to check out of the whole mess. But can she leave Mrs. Fitzgerald behind?

1.title: Episode #3.1
1.plot: Miigs and Bustamante arrange a meeting with Kevin Fitzgerald; Fiona finally meets her tormentor; Jackie makes secret contact with Det. Hollis; Commissioner Bradshaw confronts Capt. Koenig.

locations: Los Angeles, California, USA::(House and apartment interiors)
imdb.plot outline: Fiona Fitzgerald is suffering from early onset Alzheimer's Disease. Her husband, Kevin, has just lost his job and his health insurance. Desperate to find a way to pay for his wife's very expensive Alzheimer's medication, he goes into the drug dealing business with his son's best friend. One day, Fiona goes out to get the morning newspaper and doesn't return. Mrs. Fitzgerald Is Missing. Is she wandering around in an Alzheimer's haze or did something go very wrong with the drug business? As it turns out, the very people Kevin Fitzgerald reaches out to, in an effort to locate his wife, may just be responsible for her disappearance. It seems everyone, even the cops, has a plan to find the missing Fiona Fitzgerald and also make a buck in the process. Will the Fitzgeralds, who seemingly love each other very much, ever be reunited?
imdb.title: Mrs. Fitzgerald Is Missing
plot: A woman with early onset Alzheimer's Disease goes missing. Is she wandering around in an Alzheimer's haze or did something go very wrong with her husband's drug dealing business.

Fiona Fitzgerald is suffering from early onset Alzheimer's Disease. Her husband, Kevin, has just lost his job and his health insurance. Desperate to find a way to pay for his wife's very expensive Alzheimer's medication, he goes into the drug dealing business with his son's best friend. One day, Fiona goes out to get the morning newspaper and doesn't return. _Mrs. Fitzgerald Is Missing_ (qv). Is she wandering around in an Alzheimer's haze or did something go very wrong with the drug business? As it turns out, the very people Kevin Fitzgerald reaches out to, in an effort to locate his wife, may just be responsible for her disappearance. It seems everyone, even the cops, has a plan to find the missing Fiona Fitzgerald and also make a buck in the process. Will the Fitzgeralds, who seemingly love each other very much, ever be reunited?::Dave Bean
